attribute.description: A reference to Data instance which holds data.
attribute.name: data

attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Class associated to chart containing div element.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: A reference to C3ViewDataSet which holds actual selection.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: The ValueExpression linking this component to a property in a backing bean
attribute.name: binding

tag.description: Allows user to zoom on chart.

attribute.description: True if chart zooming should be enabled.
attribute.name: enabled

attribute.description: Y axis domain will be updated to the zoomed region, if true is set. Default false.
attribute.name: rescale

attribute.description: The begin of potential chart extent. Default is 1.
attribute.name: extentFrom

attribute.description: The end of potential chart extent. Default is 10.
attribute.name: extentTo

attribute.description: Javascript to be executed when zooming is performed.
attribute.name: onzoom

tag.description: Allows specification of visual attributes of chart's tooltip.

attribute.description: A flag whether to show tooltip or not.
attribute.name: show

attribute.description: If true set, tooltip will be grouped for corresponding data points. Default true.
attribute.name: grouped

tag.description: Allows specify additional visual attributes of DONUT chart.

attribute.description: A width of donut in px.
attribute.name: width

attribute.description: Title to show in center of donut.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: A flag whether to enable pie pieces expanding or not. Default true.
attribute.name: expand

attribute.description: A flag whether to enable labels to show or not. Default true.
attribute.name: showLabels

tag.description: Allows specify additional visual attributes of BAR chart.

attribute.description: Set if min or max value will be 0 on bar chart. Default true.
attribute.name: zerobased

attribute.description: A width of bar in px.
attribute.name: width

tag.description: Allows specify additional visual attributes of GAUGE chart.

attribute.description: A width of gauge in px.
attribute.name: width

attribute.description: Minimum value to show in gauge. Default 0.
attribute.name: min

attribute.description: Maximum value to show in gauge. Default 100.
attribute.name: max

attribute.description: Units to show in gauge.
attribute.name: units

attribute.description: A flag whether to enable gauge expanding or not. Default true.
attribute.name: expand

attribute.description: A flag whether to enable labels to show or not. Default true.
attribute.name: showLabels

tag.description: Adds a new grid on X axis. Must be nested in grids tag.

attribute.description: A value of X axis where grid will be rendered.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: A text to show next to the grid.
attribute.name: text

tag.description: Adds a new grid on Y axis. Must be nested in grids tag.

attribute.description: A value of Y axis where grid will be rendered.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: A text to show next to the grid.
attribute.name: text

tag.description: Tag nests components GridX and GridY for specifying grids rendered on chart.
Allows specification of visual attributes of chart's legend.

attribute.description: Defines the position of legend. Allowed values are BOTTOM, RIGHT, INSET. Default BOTTOM.
attribute.name: position

attribute.description: A flag to indicate if legend should be showed.
attribute.name: show

attribute.description: True if legend should be hidden.
attribute.name: hide

attribute.description: If position is set to INSET, one can define an anchor. Allowed are TOPLEFT, TOPRIGHT, BOTTOMLEFT, BOTTOMRIGHT. Default TOPLEFT.
attribute.name: insetAnchor

attribute.description: Defines X position of anchor if INSET is set.
attribute.name: insetX

attribute.description: Defines Y position of anchor if INSET is set.
attribute.name: insetY

attribute.description: Defines max legend steps of anchor if INSET is set.
attribute.name: insetStep

attribute.description: Javascript to be executed when click on legend is performed.
attribute.name: onclick

attribute.description: Javascript to be executed when mouse over the legend is performed.
attribute.name: onmouseover

attribute.description: Javascript to be executed when mouse left the legend.
attribute.name: onmouseout

attribute.description: Top padding in px.
attribute.name: top

attribute.description: Right padding in px.
attribute.name: right

attribute.description: Left padding in px.
attribute.name: left

attribute.description: Bottom padding in px.
attribute.name: bottom

tag.description: Allows specify additional visual attributes of PIE chart.

attribute.description: A flag whether to enable pie pieces expanding or not. Default true.
attribute.name: expand

attribute.description: A flag whether to enable labels to show or not. Default true.
attribute.name: showLabels

tag.description: Allows specification of visual attributes of chart's points.

attribute.description: A flag whether to show chart points or not. Default true.
attribute.name: show

attribute.description: Radius of each point.
attribute.name: r

attribute.description: Boolean if point can be expanded.
attribute.name: expand

attribute.description: Radius of expanded point.
attribute.name: expandR

attribute.description: Radius of selected point.
attribute.name: selectR

tag.description: Adds a new region rendered on chart.

attribute.description: Defines axis where region should be rendered. X or Y.
attribute.name: axis

attribute.description: Defines where region should start.
attribute.name: start

attribute.description: Defines where region should ends.
attribute.name: end

attribute.description: CSS class attached to region.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Width of chart.
attribute.name: width

attribute.description: Height of chart.
attribute.name: height

tag.description: Allows to render subchart and to specify its visual attributes.

attribute.description: Defines if subchart should be rendered.
attribute.name: show

attribute.description: Height of subchart.
attribute.name: height

attribute.description: Javascript to be executed when brush event is performed.
attribute.name: onbrush

attribute.description: Defines duration of transitions in millis. Attention! Changes made to transition must be also made to all Modifiers. I.e. all Modifier objects must have same/longer transition then the value specified here. Otherwise it's very probable, that there will be animation problems (some modifier will cancel animation of another, because of its start before the transition ends).
attribute.name: duration
